message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15000 to you. To ensure we both reach an agreement that's fair and beneficial, I propose a price of $12000 for this exceptional product. This offer allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate while ensuring I receive a fair return for my efforts and investment. Please let me know if you need any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response.
